senses.definition: 一種中國占卜嘅方式；求籤需要一個裝滿竹籤嘅筒，呢啲竹籤上面有個編號，噉#解籤 嘅人會就根據呢個編號，揾番相應嘅#籤文；佢會根據呢段籤文占卜；成個過程就叫求籤 (Kau Cim; to tell one's fortune from bamboo slips: to shake off a bamboo slip from a bamboo container while praying to a Buddhist God and then study the meanings behind the particular slip)

senses.definition: 形容非常誇張嘅#反話，聽/睇落同想表達嘅意思幾乎相反 (speech or statement that is so sarcastic it ends up conveying the complete opposite message to the audience)

senses.definition: 事物發展嘅趨勢 (trend)

senses.definition: 喜好；比較可能出現嘅思想或者行為 (preference; tendency)

senses.definition: 喺落成典禮度將冚住嘅紅布拉開，象徵被冚住嘅嘢正式啓用嘅儀式；引申為某啲嘢啓用或者某啲重大、維持一段時間嘅事件開始 ((lit.) to raise curtain; (fig.) to inaugurate; to unveil, esp. a monument)

senses.definition: #屎；#糞便（量詞：篤） (shit; faeces; excrement)

senses.definition: #港鐵#巴士，因為路線編號都係K開頭而得名，而K代表昔日嘅#九廣鐵路（KCR）（量詞：架／部） (MTR bus)

senses.definition: 引伸指無奈接受 (figuratively, to accept reluctantly)

examples.jyutping: ji4 tung4 kui2 bun2

senses.definition: #cute 嘅#疊字，強調某人或者某物件好可愛 (very cute)

senses.definition: #出賣 對方，令人受到極大損失 (to betray, to sell someone out, such that someone suffers a great loss)

examples.jyutping: ni1 go3 neoi5 jin2 jyun4 gei2 kam1 tai2, ceot1 dou6 do1 nin4 zung6 hai6 gam3 leng3.
examples.translation: That actress has a long-lasting beauty, she keeps shining through out all those years.

senses.definition: 形容物品、資源消耗嘅速度慢，消耗量少都發揮到功效，有用極都用唔晒嘅感覺 (economical)
senses.label: 形容詞

examples.text: 包洗衣粉好襟使，一包可以用半年。
examples.jyutping: baau1 sai2 ji1 fan2 hou2 kam1 sai2, jat1 baau1 ho2 ji5 jung6 bun3 nin4.
examples.translation: I have been using this package of washing powder for six months. It's quite economical.

senses.definition: 向另一個人（動物）提出想成為伴侶 (to court; to pursue romantically)
senses.label: 動詞

examples.text: 孔雀求偶嗰陣會張開佢哋個屏，好似男人求偶嗰陣會露肌肉噉。
examples.jyutping: hung2 zoek3 kau4 ngau5 go2 zan2 wui5 zoeng1 hoi1 keoi5 dei6 go3 ping4, hou2 ci5 naam4 jan2 kau4 ngau5 go2 zan2 wui5 lou6 gei1 juk6 gam2
examples.translation: Peacocks erect their trains when they are courting a peahen. I find it similar to human males showing off their muscles when they are courting a woman.

senses.definition: 一種集體遊戲：玩家被派成不同陣營中嘅各種角色，玩家要競猜殺戮者嘅身份或殲滅敵方玩家 (mafia, the party game)
senses.label: 名詞

senses.definition: 喺#小説、#戲劇 等故事創作，用嚟豐富敍述同情節嘅一啲手法同主題（量詞：條） (trope, a recurring element used in storytelling)
senses.label: 名詞

examples.text: 「主角走咗入一個異世界」係好多故仔都用過嘅橋段。《愛麗絲夢遊仙境》就用咗。
examples.jyutping: zyu2 gok3 zau2 zo2 jap6 jat1 go3 ji6 sai3 gaai3 hai6 hou2 do1 gu2 zai2 dou1 jung6 gwo3 ge3 kiu4 dyun6 oi3 lai6 si1 mung6 jau4 sin1 ging2 zau6 jung6 zo2.
examples.translation: The main protagonist having been trapped in another world" is a trope used by many stories. Alice's Adventure in Wonderland has used it.

senses.definition: 百萬#蚊 (a million dollars)
senses.label: 量詞

examples.text: 間公司一上市，六叔就攞咗三球去銀行掃貨。
examples.jyutping: gaan1 gung1 si1 jat1 soeng5 si5, luk6 suk1 zau6 lo2 zo2 saam1 kau4 heoi3 ngan4 hong4 sou3 fo3.
examples.translation: Once this company is listed, Uncle Six took 3 million dollars to the bank to buy their stock.

senses.definition: 將雪糕整成球狀時用嘅單位 (quantifier of ice-cream ball)

examples.text: 杏梅唔理自己減緊肥，見到意大利雪糕馬上買咗兩球嚟食。
examples.jyutping: hang6 mui4 m4 lei5 zi6 gei2 gaam2 gan2 fei4, gin3 dou3 ji3 daai6 lei6 syut3 gou1 maa5 soeng6 maai5 zo2 loeng5 kau4 lai4 sik6.
examples.translation: Hun Mui put away her plan of losing weight, when she saw the gelato she bought two balls of it at once.

senses.definition: 計算足球比賽嘅入球數字 (scoring in a soccer games)

examples.text: 曼聯最終以兩球擊敗韋根，奪得英格蘭社區盾。
examples.jyutping: maan6 lyun4 zeoi3 zung1 ji5 loeng5 kau4 gik1 baai6 wai4 gan1, dyut6 dak1 jing1 gaak3 laan4 se5 keoi1 teon5.
examples.translation: Manchester United finally beat the Wigan with 2 scores, and get the England Community Shield.

senses.definition: 輯錄多於一部電視劇、影劇嘅合集（量詞：套／齣） (generalized term for TV series and dramas)
senses.label: 名詞

examples.text: 一套好嘅劇集係點睇都唔會厭。
examples.jyutping: jat1 tou3 hou2 ge3 kek6 zaap6 hai6 dim2 tai2 dou1 m4 wui5 jim3.
examples.translation: You won't be bored when you are watching a good TV series.

senses.definition: 大專院校術語，指成績評級畀得好嚴嘅講師、教授 (strict grader; professor who often fails students; usually used in higher education institutions)
senses.label: 名詞

examples.text: 啲人話廖教授係killer，我又唔覺得喎，個grade唔算差吖。
examples.jyutping: di1 jan4 waa6 liu6 gaau3 sau6 hai6 kiu1 laa2, ngo5 jau6 m4 gok3 dak1 wo3, go3 gwei1 m4 syun3 caa1 aa1.
examples.translation: People say Professor Liu is a strict grader. I don't really think so, as my grade is not bad.

senses.definition: 用嚟限制行為嘅嘢，通常如果唔跟規矩會有懲罰 (rules; regulations; measures)
senses.label: 語素

examples.jyutping: haau6 kwai1
examples.translation: school regulations

senses.definition: 缺陷、遺漏；物質或非物質上嘅欠缺 (shortcoming; deficiency and deficit in something)
senses.label: 名詞

examples.jyutping: zyu3 ji2 lik6 kyut3 sat1 zing3
examples.translation: Attention Deficit Disorder (ADD)

senses.definition: 精神障礙：病癥包括重複特定儀式行為、唔能夠完美又完整噉按步重複儀式所伴隨嘅焦慮等等；通常同強迫型性格障礙混淆 (Obsessive-Compulsive Disorder (OCD), a mental disorder with symptoms including but not limited to specific repetitive ritual behaviours and anxiety which comes with the incompletion of the rituals, often confused with Obsessive-Compulsive Personality Disorder (OCPD))
senses.label: 名詞

examples.text: 強迫症患者好多都有潔癖。
examples.jyutping: koeng4 bik1 zing3 waan6 ze2 hou2 do1 dou1 jau5 git3 pik1.
examples.translation: People with OCD are often observed compulsive cleanliness.

senses.definition: 亦都用嚟表達執完嘢之後嘅滿足感 (also used to express satisfaction after tidying-up)

examples.text: 「見到咁整齊，好治癒！」 「強迫症患者報到！」
examples.jyutping: gin3 dou2 gam3 zing2 cai4, hou2 zi6 jyu6! koeng4 bik1 zing3 waan6 ze2 bou3 dou3!
examples.translation: It is healing to see everything so neat and tidy." "OCD here!

senses.definition: 選擇去做（或唔做）一件事 (to decide; to make up one's mind)
senses.label: 動詞

examples.jyutping: ngo5 kyut3 ding6 gaai3 jin1.
examples.translation: I have decided to give up smoking.

senses.definition: 窮到極點 (very poor, literally "poor to be scorched")
senses.label: 形容詞

examples.text: 呢期買咗好多嘢，而家窮到燶啊。
examples.jyutping: ni1 kei4 maai5 zo2 hou2 do1 je5, ji4 gaa1 kung4 dou3 nung1 aa3.
examples.translation: I've bought many things recently. I'm really broke now.

senses.definition: 一樣嘢偏向一個方向 (to tilt; to incline to)
senses.label: 動詞

examples.text: 塊板平衡得唔好，成日傾斜去右邊。
examples.jyutping: faai3 baan2 ping4 hang4 dak1 m4 hou2, seng4 jat6 king1 ce4 heoi3 jau6 bin1.
examples.translation: This board is badly installed and tilts to the right hand side.

senses.definition: #偏袒；偏幫一邊 (to incline; to be partial)

examples.text: 政府呢個政策擺到明向大財團傾斜。
examples.jyutping: zing3 fu2 ni1 go3 zing3 caak3 baai2 dou3 ming4 hoeng3 daai6 coi4 tyun4 king1 ce4.
examples.translation: This policy is explicitly favourable to major corporations.

senses.definition: 指打波時球員用手或球拍大力打個波，務求高速擊中目標嘅動作（量詞：個／下） (spiking; the action to hit a ball with a large force to make it hit a target quickly)
senses.label: 名詞

examples.text: 佢呢下扣殺真係又快又準。
examples.jyutping: keoi5 ni1 haa5 kau3 saat3 zan1 hai6 jau6 faai3 jau6 zeon2.
examples.translation: This spike of hers is swift and accurate.

senses.definition: 冇要求；馬虎；隨便；冇所謂 (without strict requirements; without due diligence; carelessly; don't care; casually; whatever)
senses.label: 形容詞

examples.jyutping: kau4 kei4 gaau1 caai1
examples.translation: to finish a task without due dilligence

senses.definition: 奇怪；異於平常 (strange; queer; extraordinary; odd; weird)
senses.label: 形容詞

examples.jyutping: kei4 jan4 kei4 si6
examples.translation: strange men and unusual affairs

senses.definition: 意想不到；出乎意料 (surprising)

examples.text: 咁耐冇見過佢，移咗民都唔奇。
examples.jyutping: gam3 noi6 mou5 gin3 gwo3 keoi5, ji4 zo2 man4 dou1 m4 kei4.
examples.translation: Haven't seen him for ages. Wouldn't be surprised if he emigrated abroad.

senses.definition: #評論、#回應 (comment)
senses.label: 名詞

examples.text: 戲中有唔少超有共鳴嘅對白，好多人睇完呢套愛情電影嘅comment都係「喊到傻咗！」。
examples.jyutping: hei3 zung1 jau5 m4 siu2 ciu1 jau5 gung6 ming4 ge3 deoi3 baak6, hou2 do1 jan4 tai4 jyun4 li1 tou3 oi3 cing4 din6 jing2 ge3 kam1 men4 dou1 hai6 haam3 dou3 so4 zo2.
examples.translation: There are a lot of lines that resonate with the audience and people's comment on this romantic movie is that they 'cry their eyes out'.

senses.definition: 赤手空拳毆鬥 (fist fight)
senses.label: 名詞

examples.text: 兩個麻甩佬打下拳頭交啫，又冇擸架撐，少少皮外傷啫。口頭警告算啦，唔使返差館咁麻煩。
examples.jyutping: loeng5 go3 maa1 lat1 lou2 daa2 haa5 kyun4 tau4 gaau1 ze1, jau6 mou5 laap3 gaa3 caang1, siu2 siu2 pei4 ngoi6 soeng1 ze1. hau2 tau4 ging2 gou3 syun3 laa1, m4 sai2 faan1 caai1 gun2 gam3 maa4 faan4.
examples.translation: [ChatGPT]The two guys had a fistfight, but no serious injuries. A verbal warning is enough, no need to bring them to the police station.

senses.definition: 將本身係液體嘅嘢凝固成啫喱狀 (to solidify)
senses.label: 動詞

examples.text: 我整親薑汁撞奶，啲奶都唔瓊囉。
examples.jyutping: ngo5 zing2 can1 goeng1 zap1 zong6 naai5, di1 naai5 dou1 m4 king4 lo1.
examples.translation: The milk never solidifies whenever I try to make a ginger milk curd.

senses.definition: 廣泛；一般；形容包括得嘅都係比較普遍嘅概念 (broad; general)
senses.label: 形容詞

examples.jyutping: koi3 kut3 ji4 jin4
examples.translation: in brief; in general

senses.definition: 始終有一度預計錯誤或者做得唔好，以致影響全局 (to take a wrong step; to miscalculate; literally: to take a wrong step in chess)
senses.label: 語句

examples.text: 雖然佢一直領先，但最後棋差一著，輸咗比賽。
examples.jyutping: seoi1 jin4 keoi5 jat1 zik6 ling5 sin1, daan6 zeoi3 hau6 kei4 caa1 jat1 zoek6, syu1 zo2 bei2 coi3.
examples.translation: Even though she was in the lead all the way through, she miscalculated at the very end and lost the competition.

senses.definition: 對一個人有所欠缺、唔合理咁對待 (to treat unfairly)
senses.label: 動詞

examples.text: 如果你幫我，我唔會虧待你嘅。
examples.jyutping: jyu4 gwo2 nei5 bong1 ngo5 ngo5 m4 wui5 kwai1 doi6 nei5 ge3.
examples.translation: If you help me, I will not treat you unfairly.

senses.definition: #輸 到成支#軍隊 都唔成形，形容慘敗。 (to be routed)
senses.label: 動詞

examples.text: 尋日我同阿松捉棋，殺到佢完全潰不成軍。
examples.jyutping: cam4 jat6 ngo5 tung4 aa3 cung4 zuk1 kei2, saat3 dou3 keoi5 jyun4 cyun4 kui2 bat1 sing4 gwan1.
examples.translation: Yesterday I played chess with A-chung. I totally routed him.

senses.definition: 公佈結果 (to announce; to make known)
senses.label: 動詞

examples.text: 抽獎結果將於下周六揭曉。
examples.jyutping: cau1 zoeng2 git3 gwo2 zoeng1 jyu1 haa6 zau1 luk6 kit3 hiu3.
examples.translation: The result of the lucky draw will be announced next Saturday.

senses.definition: 學生喺冇通知或者請假之下，突然唔返學上堂 (to be absent from school without informing the school in advance and the school's approval; to skip class)
senses.label: 動詞

examples.text: 佢無端端曠課三日；佢返嚟學校之後，一定會受到嚴厲嘅處分。
examples.jyutping: keoi5 mou4 dyun1 dyun1 kwong3 fo3 saam1 jat6, keoi5 faan1 lai4 hok6 haau6 zi1 hau6, jat1 ding6 wui5 sau6 dou3 jim4 lai6 ge3 cyu5 fan1.
examples.translation: He has been skipping classes for no reason for three days; when he comes back to school, he will certainly be heavily penalized.

senses.definition: 一種藥物 (quinine, an antimalarial)
senses.label: 名詞

senses.definition: 瘋狂、放蕩 ((of character, style) wild)
senses.label: 形容詞

examples.jyutping: kwong4 je5 gik1 cing4

senses.definition: 異常而且美好 (fascinating; intriguing)
senses.label: 形容詞

examples.jyutping: kei4 miu6 lok6 jyun4
examples.translation: Wonderland

senses.definition: 特別着重而大力提出一樣嘢 (to emphasise; to stress on)
senses.label: 動詞

examples.text: 老闆成日強調合作精神嘅重要性。
examples.jyutping: lou5 baan2 sing4 jat6 koeng4 diu6 hap6 zok3 zing1 san4 ge3 cung4 jiu3 sing3.
examples.translation: The boss always emphasises the importance of team work.

senses.definition: 向另一個人提出要求#結婚 (to propose (marriage))
senses.label: 動詞

examples.jyutping: kau4 fan1 gaai3 zi2
examples.translation: proposal ring

senses.definition: 貧窮、落後嘅地方 (remote and backward place; literally: poor rural area, remote earth)
senses.label: 名詞

examples.text: 好多人都覺得柬埔寨只係一個窮鄉僻壤。
examples.jyutping: hou2 do1 jan4 dou1 gok3 dak1 gaan2 pou4 zaai6 zi2 hai6 jat1 go3 kung4 hoeng1 pik1 joeng6.
examples.translation: People usually think that Cambodia is a remote and backward place.

senses.definition: #圍 住某樣嘢，令到佢每邊都同外界隔開 (to enclose; to close in; to surround; to encircle)
senses.label: 動詞

examples.jyutping: tam4 tam4 kwaak1
examples.translation: to circle around

senses.definition: 隱藏自己嘅身份，將自己變成其他人嘅樣貌 (to disguise)
senses.label: 動詞

examples.text: 佢喬裝成警察去打劫銀行。
examples.jyutping: keoi5 kiu4 zong1 sing4 ging2 caat3 heoi3 daa1 gip3 ngan4 hong4.
examples.translation: He disguises as a policeman to rob a bank.

senses.definition: 唔#讓步，堅守自己嘅立場或者條件 (to stand firm (on one's stance or offer))
senses.label: 動詞

examples.jyutping: keoi5 kei5 ngaang6, jat1 man1 dou1 m4 gaam2.
examples.translation: She was firm and she would not even give a dollar off.

senses.definition: 學期尾嘅考試（量詞：本/期） (end-of-term examination)
senses.label: 名詞

examples.text: 唔緊要啦，你都係肥咗期考啫，大考再嚟過囉。
examples.jyutping: m4 gan2 jiu3 laa1, nei5 dou1 hai6 fei4 zo2 kei4 haau2 ze1, daai6 haau2 zoi3 lai4 gwo3 lo1.
examples.translation: It's not a big deal if you failed the end-of-term examination, just get your scores up in the final one.

senses.definition: 形容一包零食或者預先包裝好嘅食品份量好多，可以食好耐都食唔完 (to describe pre-packed snacks having a large portion and can be munched on for a long time)
senses.label: 形容詞

examples.jyutping: baau1 haa1 pin2 gam3 daai6, hou2 kam1 sik6.
examples.translation: This pack of shrimp crackers is almost bottomless, it is going to last us a long time.

senses.definition: #買 (to purchase; to buy)
senses.label: 語素

examples.jyutping: juk6 kau3 cung4 cuk1
examples.translation: don't hesitate to buy

senses.definition: 買入 (to make a purchase)
senses.label: 動詞

senses.definition: #強盛 同埋#衰弱 嘅#對比、程度 (intensity; strong and weak)
senses.label: 名詞

examples.text: 喺音樂上，節奏嘅強弱係好重要嘅一環。
examples.jyutping: hai2 jam1 ngok6 soeng6, zit3 zau3 ge3 koeng4 joek6 hai6 hou2 zung6 jiu3 ge3 jat1 waan4.
examples.translation: The intensity of rhythm is very important when discussing music.

senses.definition: #買嘢，語氣有消遣性質 (to do shopping; to shop)
senses.label: 動詞

examples.jyutping: kau3 mat6 tin1 tong4
examples.translation: shopping paradise

senses.definition: 用金錢換取物件嘅擁有權或者服務 (to purchase; to buy)
senses.label: 動詞

examples.jyutping: kau3 maai5 zi2 ding6 caan2 ban2 jau5 baat3 zit3.
examples.translation: Customers can enjoy 20% off when purchasing certain products.

senses.definition: 畫案、影像嘅結構，例如入面物件嘅位置、層次同排列等 (structure of a painting or an image)
senses.label: 名詞

senses.definition: #主權#國家 之下嘅組成國家；譬如#英格蘭 係#聯合王國 嘅構成國（量詞：個） (constituent country; constituent state)
senses.label: 名詞

senses.definition: 一樣物嘢內裏嘅結構同組成嘅部份（量詞：個） (structure; construction)
senses.label: 名詞

examples.text: 個機械人嘅構造係點㗎？
examples.jyutping: go3 gei1 haai6 jan4 ge3 kau3 zou6 hai6 dim2 gaa3?
examples.translation: What is the structure of this robot?

senses.definition: 唔妥；古怪；問題 (problems yet to be uncovered; something suspicious)
senses.label: 名詞

examples.text: 有啲蹺蹊喎，唔好俾錢佢住。
examples.jyutping: jau5 di1 kiu1 kei1 wo3, m4 hou2 bei2 cin2 keoi5 zyu6.
examples.translation: That looks fishy. Don't hand him the money.

senses.definition: 對唔住自己良心嘅事，做咗之後會覺得#心虛、#於心有愧、覺得對唔住自己或者其他人（量詞：件） (unconscionable act; shameful act; immoral act)
senses.label: 名詞

examples.text: 如果你冇做虧心事，有乜好驚？
examples.jyutping: jyu4 gwo2 nei5 mou5 zou6 kwai1 sam1 si6, jau5 mat1 hou2 geng1?
examples.translation: If you have not done anything shameful, why would you feel uneasy?

senses.definition: 衰敗 (weakening)
senses.label: 動詞

examples.text: 經過連番動亂之後，呢個巍巍大國居然出現咗傾頹之勢。
examples.jyutping: ging1 gwo3 lin4 faan1 dung6 lyun6 zi1 hau6, ni1 go3 ngai4 ngai4 daai6 gwok3 geoi1 jin2 ceot1 jin6 zo2 king1 teoi4 zi1 sai3.
examples.translation: [ChatGPT]After a series of turmoil, this great country is showing signs of decline.

senses.definition: 形容一啲人喺做某啲決定嘅時候會用一啲方法請示神明，繼而得到一啲指引 (to seek guidance from the god)
senses.label: 動詞

examples.text: 佢份人好迷信，成日求神問卜。
examples.translation: This person is very superstitious and often seeks guidance from the gods or divines.

senses.definition: #能量 嘅單位，約等於 4.1868#焦耳；1 #大氣壓 力之下，將 1克水嘅温度提升#攝氏 1度所需嘅能量 (calorie)
senses.label: 量詞

senses.definition: 能量嘅單位，亦稱「千卡」、「大卡」，因為有兩個單位都叫「卡路里」，大嘅卡路里代表嘅數值係細嗰個嘅1000倍，通常用嚟量度食物營養、人體需求等等 (Calorie; food calorie; kilocalorie)
近距離戰鬥，通常指遊戲裏面 (close-quarter combat)
senses.label: 區別詞

examples.text: 小刀係最有效嘅近戰工具。
examples.jyutping: siu2 dou1 hai6 zeoi3 jau5 haau6 ge3 gan6 zin3 gung1 geoi6.
examples.translation: A dagger is the most effective melee weapon.

senses.definition: #企#穩 (to stand firm)
senses.label: 動詞

examples.jyutping: gan2 ak1 fu4 sau2, kei5 ding6 ding6.
examples.translation: Hold the handrail and stand firm.

senses.definition: 拒絕其他人嘅#好意 係唔#禮貌 嘅；表示#接受，係接受其他人嘅好意，例如禮物或者邀請時用嘅客套話 (it is impolite to turn down one's invitation or gift; used to express acceptance when receiving one's gift or invitation)
senses.label: 語句

examples.text: 多謝你嘅禮物，咁我就卻之不恭啦。
examples.jyutping: do1 ze6 nei5 ge3 lai5 mat6, gam2 ngo5 zau6 koek3 zi1 bat1 gung1 laa1.
examples.translation: Thank you for the gift. I am pleased to accept it.

senses.definition: #啓發 他人嘅心智，通常係指細路仔 (to enlighten one's mind)
senses.label: 名詞

examples.text: 為人師表，啓迪心智係我最大嘅責任。
examples.jyutping: wai4 jan4 si1 biu2, kai2 dik6 sam1 zi3 hai6 ngo5 zeoi3 daai6 ge3 zaak3 jam6.
examples.translation: As a teacher, I think of enlightenment as my highest responsibility.

senses.definition: 等級嘅高低次序（量詞：個） (grade; level; rank)
senses.label: 名詞

examples.text: 呢個課程分初、中、高三個級別。
examples.jyutping: ni1 go3 fo3 cing4 fan1 co1, zung1, gou1 saam1 go3 kap1 bit6.
examples.translation: This course is divided into three levels, including beginner, intermediate and advanced.

senses.definition: 對事物未來有正面預測，並且希望呢個預測成真嘅想法（量詞：個） (hope; expectation)
senses.label: 名詞

examples.jyutping: kei4 mong6 jyut6 daai6, sat1 mong6 jyut6 daai6.
examples.translation: The higher your expectations, the greater your disappointments.

senses.definition: 一個人坐喺一個大人嘅膊頭上面，兩隻腳輕輕夾住被騎嘅人個頭 (to sit on an adult's shoulders)
senses.label: 動詞

examples.text: 爸爸同囡囡玩騎膊馬睇煙花。
examples.jyutping: baa4 baa1 tung4 neoi4 neoi2 waan2 ke4 bok3 maa5 tai2 jin1 faa1.
examples.translation: The girl is sitting on her father's shoulders to watch the fireworks.

senses.definition: 即係 #佢 (see #佢)
senses.label: 代詞

senses.definition: 喺警局監禁疑犯 (to detain; to be held in custody)
senses.label: 動詞

examples.text: 喺香港，警察可以拘留疑犯 48 個鐘。

examples.translation: In HK, the police force can detain any suspects for at most 48 hours.

senses.definition: 比較贊成一樣嘢 (to tend to; to be inclined to; to be willing to accept)
senses.label: 動詞

examples.text: 我不嬲都傾向利益以本土為依歸呢個諗法。
examples.jyutping: ngo5 bat1 lau1 dou1 king1 hoeng3 lei6 jik1 ji5 bun2 tou2 wai4 ji1 gwai1 ni1 go3 nam2 faat3.
examples.translation: I tend to put local interests first.

senses.definition: 透過解釋既往事例令對方有所聯想 (to inspire)
senses.label: 動詞

examples.text: 多得當年老師啓發我，我今日先可以攞呢個獎。
examples.jyutping: do1 dak1 dong1 nin4 lou5 si1 kai2 faat3 ngo5, ngo5 gam1 jat6 sin1 ho2 ji5 lo2 ni1 go3 zoeng2.
examples.translation: I have to express my gratitude to my teacher for inspiring me; without him, I would not have won this award.

senses.definition: 抽象嘅諗法、觀點；只係存在響腦海之中（量詞：個） (concept; notion; idea)
senses.label: 名詞

examples.text: 你要明白基本嘅概念，先可以繼續討論落去。
examples.jyutping: nei5 jiu3 ming4 baak6 gei1 bun2 ge3 koi3 nim6, sin1 ho2 ji5 gai3 zuk6 tou2 leon6 lok6 heoi3.

senses.definition: 堅定噉選擇或者決定做一啲嘢嘅志向 (determination; resolution)

senses.definition: 一種文學創作；主要由故事角色嘅性格、對白、動作構成，加埋對環境嘅描寫，講述一個以上嘅故事，可以作為演員演出嘅根據（量詞：份／個） (script; screenplay)

examples.text: 我哋需要攝取適量嘅礦物質，以維持細胞同器官嘅正常功能。

examples.translation: We need to ingest enough minerals in order to maintain the ordinary functioning of cells and organs.

senses.definition: 模範；榜樣 (exemplar)

examples.translation: cosmos; sercret

senses.definition: 用嚟升旗嘅桿，好高；升好之後，旗就會喺旗桿頂隨風飄揚 （量詞:艘） (flag post)

senses.definition: 經常用嚟做名嘅字，本義係一種美玉 (character commonly used in names)

senses.definition: #中文 嘅#標點 符號，由開括弧「（」、閂括弧「）」組成，用嚟喺文中加添附加資訊（量詞：個） (parenthesis)
senses.label: 名詞

senses.definition: 標點符號「（」同「）」（半形就係「(」同「)」），用嚟插入注解，注釋部分詞語或者句子，即係#破折號 嘅用途之一（量詞：個） (bracket; parenthesis)
senses.label: 名詞

senses.definition: 數學符號，用嚟表示數式中優先計算嘅部份；分為#小括號、#中括號、#大括號 三個遞減層級，分別以「( )」、「[ ]」、「{ }」表示（量詞：個） ((math.) bracket)
通常指受到某啲壓力而唔出聲 (to remain silent/reticent due to some pressure)
senses.label: 動詞

examples.text: 好多人因為自身嘅經濟利益而噤聲。
examples.jyutping: hou2 do1 jan4 jan1 wai6 zi6 san1 ge3 ging1 zai3 lei6 jik1 ji4 gam3 seng1
examples.translation: Many people remain reticent because of their economic interests.

senses.definition: 喺某件事發生嘅途中 (during (a period of time); of the course of (an event))
senses.label: 介詞

examples.text: 馬拉松賽事進行其間，有個男人跌親，顴骨碎咗。
examples.jyutping: maa5 laai1 cung4 coi3 si6 zeon3 hang4 kei4 gaan1, jau5 go3 naam4 jan2 dit3 can1, kyun4 gwat1 seoi3 zo2
examples.translation: During the marathon race, a man fell over and cracked his cheekbone.

senses.definition: #貨車 (truck)
senses.label: 名詞

senses.definition: 矯正#牙齒 嘅排列 (to receive or perform orthodontic treatment)
senses.label: 動詞

examples.text: 趁後生去箍牙冇咁痛㗎。
examples.jyutping: can3 hau6 saang1 heoi3 ku1 ngaa4 mou5 gam3 tung3 gaa3.
examples.translation: Undergoing orthodontic treatment at an early age will be less painful.

senses.definition: 負責束住向外擴散嘅物件或者防止物件移動嘅圈狀物體 (a hoop-like object that holds things together)
senses.label: 名詞

examples.jyutping: tau4 ku1
examples.translation: headband

senses.definition: 不道德；#賤格 (mean; lack of virtues)
senses.label: 形容詞

examples.text: 個賊咁缺德㗎，乞衣啲錢都偷。
examples.translation: That robber is so terrible, (he) even stole the money from a beggar.

senses.definition: 一個#團體 會為自己設計一個#圖案，用嚟代表自己，象徵團體嘅精神，亦都起到識別或者指揮作用；呢個圖案會畫喺塊布上面，可以掛喺牆或者桿上面，隨風飄揚；嗰塊布就係旗（量詞：面／塊／枝） (flag; banner)
senses.label: 名詞

examples.jyutping: gwok3 kei4
examples.translation: national flag

senses.definition: #纏 埋一齊 (to tangle themselves; to knot)
senses.label: 動詞

examples.jyutping: ngo5 go3 ji5 tung2 kiu5 maai4 zo2 jat1 gau6.
examples.translation: My headphone cord was knotted.

senses.definition: 將線圍圈#捲 (to twine; to coil)

examples.jyutping: kiu5 hou2 di1 laang1
examples.translation: to coil the woollen yarn

senses.definition: #常識；人假設其他人應該具備嘅生活知識，例如觀察、理解、判斷事物嘅能力 (common sense)
senses.label: 名詞

examples.jyutping: nei5 dou1 mou5 kam1 man1 sens1 ge2!
examples.translation: You don't have any common sense!

senses.definition: #確認，仔細檢查有冇錯漏 (to confirm; to assure)
senses.label: 動詞

examples.jyutping: tung4 nei5 kon6 foem1 faan1 fan6 joek3 sin1.
examples.translation: Let me confirm the contract with you first.

senses.definition: 循規蹈矩，唔會做越軌嘅事 (well-behaved; well-disciplined)
senses.label: 形容詞

examples.text: 你放心啦，佢份人都算幾規矩嘅。
examples.jyutping: nei5 fong3 sam1 laa1, keoi5 fan6 jan4 dou1 syun3 gei2 kwai1 geoi2 ge3.
examples.translation: Don't worry. He is quite a well-behaved person.

senses.definition: #諗 一啲新嘅計畫 (to conceive; to formulate)
senses.label: 動詞

senses.definition: 指行為、情況令人覺得苦惱；唔自在；#滋擾 ((of behaviour or situation) annoying; making others uncomfortable; causing nuisance)
senses.label: 形容詞

examples.text: 你成日半夜三更打嚟，我覺得好困擾呀。
examples.jyutping: nei5 seng4 jat6 bun3 je6 saam1 gaang1 daa2 lai4, ngo5 gok3 dak1 hou2 kwan3 jiu2 aa3.
examples.translation: You always call me in the midnight, and that really annoys me.

senses.definition: 做得唔好；表現欠佳 (to perform badly, poorly)
senses.label: 語句

examples.text: 由於競爭激烈，上半年業績強差人意。
examples.jyutping: jau4 jyu1 ging3 zang1 gik1 lit6, soeng6 bun3 nin4 jip6 zik1 koeng5 caa1 jan4 ji3.
examples.translation: The sales in the first half of this year were not satisfactory due to the fierce competition.

senses.definition: 指一堆地理位置相近嘅島嘅集合 (archipelago)
senses.label: 名詞

senses.definition: 包括#電視劇、#舞台劇、#音樂劇 等等由#劇本 做基礎發展出嚟嘅表演作品，成套作品（由寫劇本去到表演）就叫劇作 (theatrical work (includes TV dramas, stage plays, musicals, etc.))
senses.label: 名詞

examples.text: 呢間工作室嘅劇作全部都係大師級。
examples.jyutping: ni1 gaan1 gung1 zok3 sat1 ge3 kek6 zok3 cyun4 bou6 dou1 hai6 daai6 si1 kap1.
examples.translation: All works by this studio are masterpieces.

senses.definition: 政黨入面專職地區工作，準備選區議員嘅人 (Participators of a political party who profession in local community service, prepare for being a District Council candidate)
senses.label: 名詞

examples.text: 邊度開街站接觸到最多街坊？問下啲區佬就最清楚。
examples.jyutping: bin1 dou6 hoi1 gaai1 zaam6 zip3 zuk1 dou2 zeoi3 do1 gaai1 fong1? man6 haa5 di1 keoi1 lou2 zau6 zeoi3 cing1 co2.
examples.translation: Where should we set up a street booth in order to reach the most of the neighbourhood? Ask the local district councillor, they know it the best.

senses.definition: 喺名詞前面，表示有多過一個 ((prefix) multi-; cross-)
senses.label: 詞綴

examples.jyutping: kwaa1 bou6 mun4 hap6 zok3
examples.translation: cross-department cooperation

senses.definition: 舉起隻腳去移動 (to step; to stride)
senses.label: 動詞

examples.jyutping: hoeng3 cin4 kwaa1 ceot1 jat1 daai6 bou6
examples.translation: to take a big step forward

senses.definition: #跨越，穿過 (to cross)

examples.jyutping: kwaa1 ging2
examples.translation: to cross the border

senses.definition: 做事盡力，有上進心 (diligent; assiduous)
senses.label: 形容詞

examples.jyutping: keoi5 gung1 zok3 kan4 fan5.
examples.translation: He exerts great effort in his work.

senses.definition: 接近一個方向 (to keep to; to get near)
senses.label: 動詞

examples.jyutping: so2 jau5 ce1 loeng2 dou1 jiu3 kaau3 zo2 sai2
examples.translation: All vehicles should keep to the left.

senses.definition: 對一樣嘢嘅依賴 (to depend on; to rely on)

examples.jyutping: kaau3 m4 zyu6
examples.translation: unreliable

senses.definition: 大致噉#設計，而唔會包括每個細節 (planning)
senses.label: 名詞

examples.jyutping: sing4 si5 kwai1 waak6
examples.translation: town planning

senses.definition: 上面印住、寫咗訊息嘅硬身紙、膠片（量詞：張／疊） (card)
senses.label: 名詞

examples.jyutping: kaat1 pin2
examples.translation: namecard

senses.definition: 信用咭嘅簡稱（量詞：張） (short form for credit card)

examples.jyutping: cim1 kaat1
examples.translation: to use a credit card

senses.definition: 火車、地鐵車廂嘅量詞 ((English loan) car; compartment of a train)
senses.label: 量詞

examples.jyutping: tau4 dang2 ce1 soeng1 hai2 dai6 luk6 kaa1.
examples.translation: The first-class compartment is at the sixth compartment.

senses.definition: 鑽石嘅質量單位，一卡約略等於200毫克 (carat)

examples.jyutping: loeng5 kaa1 zyun3 sek6
examples.translation: a diamond of two carats

senses.definition: 菜嘅莖部；硬過葉、纖維比較多 (vegetable stem)
senses.label: 名詞

examples.text: 佢食菜淨係鍾意食梗，唔食葉。
examples.jyutping: keoi5 sik6 coi3 zing6 hai6 zung1 ji3 sik6 kwaang2, m4 sik6 jip6.
examples.translation: He only eats vegetable stems, but not leaves.

senses.definition: #首相（內閣總理）。「揆」即「管理、掌管」之意，引申為總攬政務嘅人，如宰相。 (prime minister)
senses.label: 語素

examples.jyutping: jing1 kwai4
examples.translation: British prime minister

senses.definition: 風勢猛烈、風力強勁嘅 #風（量詞：陣／股） (fierce wind; gale)
senses.label: 名詞

examples.jyutping: kwong4 fung1 bou6 jyu5
examples.translation: violent thunderstorm (literally: fierce wind and rain)

senses.definition: 用嚟將兩塊纖維拮埋一齊嘅金屬針，針頭用金屬包住（量詞：個） (safety pin)
senses.label: 名詞

senses.definition: 某啲組織或者人造物件嘅大細（量詞：個） (scale; size; scope)
senses.label: 名詞

examples.jyutping: ni1 gaan1 gung1 si1 go3 kwai1 mou4 hou2 daai6
examples.translation: The scale of this company is very big.

senses.definition: 形容身體組織因為#感染、#腐蝕 或者#磨擦 而#損壞 甚至#腐爛 ((of wounds) to fester, to ulcerate)
senses.label: 動詞

examples.text: 佢因為傷口發炎而搞到皮膚潰爛。
examples.jyutping: keoi5 jan1 wai6 soeng1 hau2 faat3 jim4 ji4 gaau2 dou3 pei4 fu1 kui2 laan6.

senses.definition: 用圈，套或者帶環繞著一樣嘢將之固定 (to buckle; to fasten)
senses.label: 動詞

examples.jyutping: kau3 on1 cyun4 daai2
examples.translation: to fasten seat belt

senses.definition: 減除 (to deduct; to minus)

examples.jyutping: kau3 jan4 gung1

senses.definition: 強留；羈押 (to withhold something or someone forcefully)

examples.jyutping: kau3 aat3
examples.translation: to detain; to impound

senses.definition: 用高熱將食材蒸熟，將唔同食材嘅味道濃縮並保存響一款食材入面 (to braise)

examples.jyutping: kau3 juk6
examples.translation: braised meat

senses.definition: 泛指居住喺一個特定地方嘅大眾 (general public; crowd)

examples.jyutping: kwan4 zung3 aat3 lik6
examples.translation: pressure from the general public

senses.definition: 再睇或者聽多次頭先寫過或者講過嘅嘢，肯定無錯漏 (to affirm; to confirm)
senses.label: 動詞

examples.jyutping: kok3 jing6 soeng1 fong1 ge3 laap6 coeng4
examples.translation: to affirm the position of the two parties

senses.definition: 一份由雙方或更多人訂立嘅#協議（量詞：份） (contract; agreement; deed)
senses.label: 名詞

examples.jyutping: se5 wui2 kai3 joek3
examples.translation: social contract

senses.definition: 事物嘅力量強大 (immense strength)

examples.translation: super glue

senses.definition: 主動而且強烈；格硬嚟 (aggressive; forceful)

senses.definition: 阿媽嘅阿哥或細佬嘅老婆（量詞：個） (wife of mother's brother)
senses.label: 名詞

senses.definition: #佣金 (commission)

examples.jyutping: ngo5 ning4 jyun2 ou1 ti1 jau5 cin2, hou2 gwo3 jiu3 kam6 mit1 seon2.
examples.translation: I'd prefer overtime compensation, rather than commission.

senses.definition: 反抗一啲力量比自己大嘅勢力，反對佢哋唔合理嘅意見，爭取自己嘅權益 (to fight for something against some people)
senses.label: 動詞

examples.text: 面對啲咁唔公平嘅決定，我哋一定抗爭到底。
examples.jyutping: min6 deoi3 di1 gam3 m4 gung1 ping4 ge3 kyut3 ding6, ngo5 dei6 jat1 ding6 kong3 zang1 dou3 dai2.

senses.definition: 巴士司機 (bus driver)
senses.label: 名詞

examples.jyutping: sai3 lou6 zai2 zung1 ji3 tai2 kaa1 tung1 pin2.
examples.translation: Children like to watch cartoons.

senses.definition: 喺原裝嘅電腦、遊戲機嘅主機板加裝嘅電路板、#硬件，增加額外功能，如#音效卡、#顯示卡 (expansion card)
senses.label: 名詞

examples.text: 部 server 冇位再加擴充卡。
examples.jyutping: bou6 soe1 faa2 mou5 wai2 zoi3 gaa1 kwong3 cung1 kaat1.
examples.translation: The server has no more slots for expansion card.

senses.definition: 卡式播放機。一種用卡式錄音帶（又作#卡式帶、#錄音帶）播放聲音嘅機器。 (cassette player)

senses.label: 名詞

senses.definition: 「#食煙」嘅正式啲嘅講法 (to smoke (cigarettes) (used in more formal contexts))

examples.jyutping: fei1 kap1 jin1 keoi1

senses.definition: 窄過一條#河 嘅水流（量詞：條） (stream)
senses.label: 名詞

senses.definition: 唔同國家嘅 (multinational)
senses.label: 區別詞

examples.jyutping: kwaa1 gwok3 gung1 si1
examples.translation: multinational company

senses.definition: 不停攀爬；爬上爬下 (to climb up and down)

examples.text: 一把年紀就唔好擒高搲低啦，跌親就麻煩喇。
examples.translation: Don't climb up and down when you're old enough, it's troublesome to fall down.

senses.definition: #鍵盤 (keyboard)

senses.definition: 增加#肺 部嘅#空氣 量 (to breathe in)

senses.definition: 用嚟綑住啲貨物嘅膠膜（量詞：卷） (stretch wrap)

examples.text: 佢呢啲牆頭草，一見對面部門唔掂就即刻向我哋靠攏。
examples.jyutping: keoi5 ni1 di1 coeng4 tau4 cou2, jat1 gin3 deoi3 min6 bou6 mun4 m4 dim6 zau6 zik1 hak1 hoeng3 ngo5 dei6 kaau3 lung5
examples.translation: He is such a spineless fence-sitter, getting close to our department once the other one was getting shutdown.

senses.definition: 專門畀球類運動進行嘅場地（量詞：個） (court, pitch or field where ball games are played)

senses.definition: 淺而窄嘅坑道；通常係俾水流過 (duct; waterway; ditch)

examples.jyutping: kau1 keoi4
examples.translation: canal

senses.definition: #冷淡；唔關心 (indifferent; not showing interest; "cool")

examples.text: 佢份人不嬲都好 cool 㗎。
examples.jyutping: keoi5 fan6 jan4 bat1 lau1 dou1 hou2 ku1 gaa3.
examples.translation: He has always been a person indifferent to things.

senses.definition: 外貌、動作或者作風吸引人、#有型 (good-looking; with style; with class; with charisma)
桌球用語，cushion 嘅簡稱，指桌球枱四圍嘅橡膠邊 (cushion (in cue sports))

examples.jyutping: go3 baak6 bo1 zong6 ku1 jap6 zo2 go3 hung4 bo1.

senses.definition: #安全套（量詞：個） (condom)

examples.translation: These days, some people claim themselves as KOLs just because they shoot a video.

senses.definition: #啤牌 入面寫住「K」，印國王人樣嘅牌（量詞：隻／張） (king in poker cards)

senses.definition: 引申指收費好貴，榨乾人啲錢嘅商人（量詞：隻） (leech; bloodsucker; someone who extorts large profit from others)
個樣睇落去相當平凡，冇咩特別 (to have a face that one is not proud of; to have an unimposing appearance)

examples.text: 佢其貌不揚，實際上係董事會成員之一。

senses.definition: 用#叩頭 嚟表示感謝 (to kowtow in order to express one's gratitude)

senses.definition: 即係#化學 科 (chemistry (subject))

examples.jyutping: duk6 kem1

senses.definition: 執行死刑，處決犯人嘅人（量詞：個） (executioner; someone whose job is to execute criminals)

senses.definition: 通常指香港區域法院，係一個次於#高等法院 嘅原訟法院 (district court; usually referring to the District Court of Hong Kong)

senses.definition: 香港地區名；位於#新界 西南部，對住#青衣 (Kwai Chung)

senses.definition: 香港地區名；#新界#葵涌 葵興邨一帶 (Kwai Hing)

examples.jyutping: ngo5 seng4 jat6 gaau2 co3 kwai4 hing1 tung4 kwai4 fong1.

senses.definition: 香港地區名；#新界#葵涌 葵芳邨一帶 (Kwai Fong, Hong Kong)
senses.label: 名詞

examples.text: 我成日搞錯#葵興 同葵芳。
examples.jyutping: ngo5 seng4 jat6 gaau2 co3 kwai4 hing1 tung4 kwai4 fong1.
examples.translation: I often mix up Kwai Hing and Kwai Fong.

senses.definition: 區域或者社區入面 (within an area, region, district or community)

examples.jyutping: keoi1 noi6 gaau1 tung1
examples.translation: traffic in the district

senses.definition: 用嚟記錄聲音嘅#磁帶，通常有長方形硬殼（量詞：餅／盒） (cassette)
senses.label: 名詞

examples.text: 都叫你唔好群埋啲唔三唔四嘅人啦！
examples.translation: I told you not to hang out with such scroundrels!

senses.definition: 一班人喺度毆鬥 (a gang fight)

examples.text: 條街頭先有人群揪，場面好混亂。
examples.translation: There was a gang fight in the street.

senses.definition: 兩個以上有互動關係、而彼此間對呢種關係有認同感嘅人（量詞：個） (colony; group; community)
senses.label: 名詞

examples.text: 要融入一個社交群體，難免會變得虛偽。
examples.jyutping: jiu3 jung4 jap6 jat1 go3 se5 gaau1 kwan4 tai2, naan4 min5 wui5 bin3 dak1 heoi1 ngai6.
examples.translation: It's hard not to put on a false front when trying to integrate into a social circle.

senses.definition: 三個以上嘅集體 (crowd; group; herd; flock)

examples.jyutping: jat1 kwan4 ngau4
examples.translation: a herd of cattle

senses.definition: 響一個組別或者群體入邊 (among which)

examples.jyutping: baan6 gung1 sat1 leoi5 min6 jau5 cat1 go3 jan4, kei4 zung1 saam1 go3 hai6 daai6 hok6 saang1.
examples.translation: There are seven people in the office, three of which are university graduates.

senses.definition: 集合眾人嘅智慧同能力 (by concerted effort)
senses.label: 語句

senses.definition: 電腦資訊量單位，等於1024#byte；為方便計算有時計1000byte (kilobyte, kibibyte)

senses.definition: 香港警察隊員佐級協會嘅別稱 (Junior Police Officers' Association (JPOA))

senses.definition: 將某啲複雜或者詳細嘅嘢濃縮，淨係簡單噉表達重點 (to summarize; to use relatively few words to describe something relatively complicated or relatively detailed)
senses.label: 動詞

senses.definition: 建造；起；搭建 (to construct)

senses.definition: #上契 之後，冇血緣關係嘅名義上嘅#爸爸（量詞：個） (a godfather; male who treat a young person as if he/she is his child; nominal father)

examples.translation: Once you buy a book, you should check if there is any damage or missing page.

senses.definition: 唔係真正嘅阿媽，雙方冇血緣關係；一啲女性長輩因為好鍾意一個後生仔女，就會收佢做契仔女，咁契仔女就會叫番佢做契媽 (a woman who treats someone as if he/she is her child)

examples.jyutping: ni1 dou6 hou2 guk6, ngo5 zau6 lai4 kyut3 joeng5 laa3!

examples.jyutping: fo1 hok6 gaa1 kit3 ji4 bat1 se2 zeoi1 caa4 beng6 duk6 ge3 jyun4 tau4.

senses.definition: 警察用司法、暴力或者其他強制手段將涉嫌犯罪嘅人或者懷疑係犯罪份子嘅資產留住 (to detain; to hold in custody)

examples.jyutping: ngo5 cam4 jat6 lok6 gaai1 maai5 sung3 mou4 dyun1 dyun1 bei2 caai1 jan4 kau3 lau4 man6 waa6.
examples.translation: I was detained by the police for questioning when I was out for groceries yesterday.

senses.definition: 對人哋兄弟嘅尊稱 (respectful address of someone else's brother)

senses.definition: #傳呼機（量詞：部） (electronic pager; beeper)
senses.label: 名詞

examples.jyutping: ko1 gei1 ji4 gaa1 dou1 bin3 man4 mat6 laa3.
examples.translation: Pagers become cultural relics nowadays.

senses.definition: 有關 #賄賂 嘅嘢；俾好處其他人以換取唔正當嘅利益 (bribe, in relation to a bribe)

examples.jyutping: hang4 kui2
examples.translation: to bribe

senses.definition: 喺一啲球類運動場中，設於球場兩邊，作為射球目標嘅門框。（量詞:個） ((sport) goal; net.)

senses.definition: 將某啲已知嘅內容歸納為重點再講出嚟 (to summarize; to outline; summary;  overview)

examples.translation: The president of the student union is summarizing his platform.

senses.definition: 簡單噉講某個範圍內最基本嘅資料 ((of book or article titles) outline; introduction of basic principles)

examples.jyutping: ni1 bun2 faan6 zeoi6 san1 lei5 hok6 koi3 leon6 hou2 jau5 jung6.
examples.translation: This introduction to the principles of criminal psychology is useful.

senses.definition: 動作唔靈活、身手笨拙 (clumsy, ungainly)
senses.label: 形容詞

examples.text: 你份人咁cap重話想參加跳舞比賽？唔好玩啦！
examples.jyutping: nei5 fan6 jan4 gam3 kep6 zung6 waa6 soeng2 caam1 gaa1 tiu3 mou5 bei2 coi3? m4 hou2 waan2 laa1!

examples.translation: Kai Tak International Airport (closed and replaced by the new one at Chek Lap Kok, named after Ho Kai and Au Tak's company then)

examples.translation: Our shop closes on the thirtieth day of the last month this lunar year, and reopens on the eighth day of the first month in the new lunar year.

senses.definition: 物品擁有權嘅轉移；送予 (to give; to gift)

examples.jyutping: ni1 go3 gu3 si6 bei2 zo2 ngo5 dei6 hou2 daai6 ge3 kai2 faat3.

senses.definition: 優惠券；消費期間能夠兑換折扣、貨品或者服務嘅#券（量詞：張） (coupon)

examples.jyutping: mou4 cung4 kai1 haau2
examples.translation: impossible to verify

senses.definition: 足球術語；指比較近波果條龍門柱 (soccer jargon; Near Post: The goal post nearest to the ball)

examples.text: 角球開得好靚，高飛曲墜，龍門諗住出迎點知個波喺半空彎向龍門，好彩後衞封好近柱，避過一劫。
examples.translation: Well done this corner kick with a nice side spin, the curving path cheated the goal keeper to rush out and try catching it, fortunately a defender was guarding the near post, or there would been a score already.

senses.definition: 利用不能兑現嘅期票，騙財嘅手法 (to obtain goods by invalid cheque as part of a fraud)

senses.definition: 唔係真正嘅細佬，雙方冇血緣關係；兩個年紀唔係差好遠嘅人，因為感情好好，所以就結成契兄弟姊妹，如果年紀比較細嘅係男性，咁大啲果個就叫佢契細佬 (a younger boy or man treated as a younger brother)

senses.definition: 唔係真正嘅#家姐，雙方冇血緣關係；兩個年紀唔係差好遠嘅人，因為感情好好，所以就結成#契 兄弟姊妹，如果年紀比較大嘅係女性，咁後生果個就叫佢契姐 (an older girl or woman treated as an older sister)

senses.definition: 一種概念，主張做一件事或者得到一樣嘢係正當、合理、合法或者合乎道德，所以有咁嘅資格同自由 (right (moral or legal entitlement))

examples.jyutping: hang4 sai2 gung1 man4 kyun4 lei6

senses.definition: 情緒激動 (emotional)

senses.definition: 因為感觸而嘆氣、嘆息 (sigh)

senses.definition: 大方；唔#孤寒 (generous)

examples.text: 政府呼籲如果有感冒嘅癥兆要即刻求診。
examples.translation: The government urges those who have symptoms of fever should seek medical care immediately.

senses.definition: 將一啲嘢收為自己嘅資源 (to acquire)
senses.label: 動詞

examples.text: 呢間公司不斷吸納海外嘅人才。
examples.translation: The company recruits talents from all over the world.

senses.definition: 唔係親生嘅仔，雙方冇血緣關係；一啲長輩因為好鍾意一個後生仔，就會收佢做契女，對佢好好 (a boy treated as a son by someone other than a parent)

senses.definition: 經儀式（#上契）確立名義關係，並冇血緣嘅#細佬；但係「契弟」通常用嚟表達第二個釋義，為咗避忌一般人會講#契細佬 (a younger boy or man treated as a nominal younger brother; this usage is very uncommon and often replaced by the euphemism #契細佬 kai3 sai3 lou2, as the offensive usage (below) is often presumed when one mentions "契弟")
senses.label: 名詞

senses.definition: 以前指男同性戀者，後來引申為社會地位低下嘅男人；而家已經變成一個冇乜特別意思，純粹鬧人用嘅字眼；專指男性（量詞：個/條） (originally referred to gay males, and subsequently extended to mean a person with low social standing; in contemporary use, it is a generic vulgar term to refer to men; a jerk; a dick)

examples.text: 你唔好恰我，咪當我契弟！
examples.jyutping: nei5 m4 hou2 hap1 ngo5, mai5 dong3 ngo5 kai3 dai6!
examples.translation: Stop it. Don't you dare look down on me.

senses.definition: #扱印；喺文件上面印一個#章、#戳 上去 (to put a stamp on)

examples.text: 收據要拎去蓋咗印先可以退税。
examples.jyutping: sau1 geoi3 jiu3 ling1 heoi3 koi3 zo2 jan3 sin1 ho2 ji5 teoi3 seoi3.

senses.definition: #限制 (to limit; to restrain; to be bound to)
senses.label: 語素

examples.jyutping: bat1 keoi1
examples.translation: not to be restricted to; not to feel bound by something

examples.translation: to arrest

senses.definition: 強烈期待 (to expect earnestly)

senses.definition: 形容一啲嘢程度強烈 (intense)

senses.label: 名詞

senses.definition: 即係#橋段；一個劇本嘅情節（量詞：條） (plot of a story)

examples.jyutping: hei3 kiu2
examples.translation: the plot of a film

senses.definition: #拳擊 運動員 (boxer)

中國唔跟正規法律負責監察、執法嘅部門俗稱 (Chinese law enforcement and surveillance departments which do not follow official laws and rules; literally: (government) powerful department)

senses.definition: 前蘇聯執行軍事同國家安全特種任務嘅有關部門 (general term of departments in former USSR responsible for national safety and military operation)
公開場合用嘅提示紙（量詞：張） (cue card)

examples.text: 我每次上台講嘢，都一定要準備cue卡先得。

senses.definition: 蔬菜名，有特殊香味（量詞：棵） (celery)

examples.jyutping: sai1 kan2
examples.translation: celery

phonetic.original: kau3 jan4 sam1 jin4:kau3 jan4 sam1 jyun4

senses.definition: 形容十分感動人 (touching; breath-taking)
senses.label: 形容詞

keywords: kau3 jan4 sam1 jin4:kau3 jan4 sam1 jyun4

senses.definition: 禦寒用嘅貼身長#內褲，通常係#棉 或者#羊毛 造嘅（#虧 指#孱弱，含有嘲笑住呢種保暖內褲嘅人身子虛弱嘅含意。）（量詞：條） (long cotton or wool underwear; long-johns; leg warmers; literally: weak man pants)
senses.label: 名詞

senses.definition: 向神禱告 (to invoke)

senses.definition: 請求外界嘅幫助 (to wish; to request)

examples.jyutping: kei4 kau4

senses.definition: 原指頭盔與裝甲；後引伸至單指裝甲亦可。 (helmet and armour; or specifically body armour only)
senses.label: 名詞

examples.text: 張翼著好盔甲，提槍出陣。

senses.definition:
